NAME: Anemia
DES: A lack of iron and other essential nutrients leads to a deficiency of red blood cells, causing fatigue and weakness.
COMP: Doctor, my hands and feet are always cold, and my muscles feel so weak lately.

NAME: Beriberi
DES: Inadequate intake of vitamin B1 (thiamine) results in severe cardiovascular and nervous system complications.
COMP: I can't seem to catch my breath. My heart races all the time, and my muscles feel so weak

NAME: Common Cold
DES: Poor nutrition weakens the immune system, making the body more susceptible to frequent and prolonged respiratory infections.
COMP: My sinuses are so congested, and I keep getting these chills and fevers.

NAME: Digestive Problems
DES: Malnutrition disrupts digestive health, causing issues like impaired nutrient absorption, indigestion, and irregular bowel movements.
COMP: I've been having a lot of stomach pain and bloating. It's really uncomfortable.

NAME: Xerophthalmia
DES: Severe vitamin A deficiency due to poor diet leads to dry, thickened, and inflamed eyes, risking blindness.
COMP: My eyes are always dry, and I have a hard time seeing at night.

NAME: Ear Infection
DES: Malnutrition weakens the immune system, increasing vulnerability to infections such as those affecting the ear.
COMP: My ear hurts so much, and I think I'm losing my hearing.

NAME: Eczema
DES: Nutrient deficiencies can exacerbate skin conditions, leading to inflamed, itchy, and cracked skin.
COMP: My skin is so dry and itchy, and there's this rash that won't go away.

NAME: Fatigue
DES: Lack of essential nutrients from a poor diet results in extreme tiredness and a persistent lack of energy.
COMP: I have no energy at all, and my muscles feel so weak.

NAME: Insomnia
DES: Poor nutrition affects brain function and sleep patterns, contributing to difficulty in falling and staying asleep.
COMP: I can't sleep at night, and during the day, I’m too tired and weak to do anything.

NAME: Migraine
DES: Deficiencies in key nutrients like magnesium can trigger severe headaches and migraines.
COMP: I’m having such bad headaches that my vision gets blurry.

NAME: Mind Fog
DES: Inadequate intake of vital nutrients impairs cognitive function, leading to confusion and difficulty concentrating.
COMP: I can't seem to focus on anything, and I feel so cranky

NAME: Hypocalcemia
DES: Insufficient calcium intake from a poor diet leads to low blood calcium levels, causing muscle cramps and spasms.
COMP: My muscles keep cramping up, and my fingers and toes feel numb.

NAME: Nausea
DES: Malnutrition and nutrient imbalances can cause gastrointestinal distress and frequent feelings of nausea.
COMP: I feel so dizzy I’m not even hungry anymore.

NAME: Hypovitaminosis A
DES: A lack of vitamin A due to poor dietary intake results in significant health issues like vision problems and immune deficiencies.
COMP: My skin is really dry, and I struggle to see at night.

NAME: Pellagra
DES: Deficiency of niacin (vitamin B3) from inadequate diet leads to dermatitis, diarrhea, and dementia.
COMP: I've got this persistent rash, and my hands and feet feel numb.

NAME: Rickets
DES: Insufficient vitamin D, calcium, or phosphate intake causes soft bones, muscles cramps, and weakness.
COMP: My muscles feel so weak, and they’ve started cramping up.

NAME: Scurvy
DES: Severe vitamin C deficiency from poor diet results in anemia, gum disease, and skin problems.
COMP: My gums are swollen and bleed so easily.

NAME: Kwashiorkor
DES: Severe protein malnutrition leads to symptoms such as edema, irritability, and an enlarged liver.
COMP: My stomach is bloated, and my whole body feels painfully swollen.

NAME: Toothache
DES: Lack of essential nutrients can lead to dental problems, including tooth decay and pain.
COMP: I have a terrible headache, and my gums are sensitive and bleeding.

NAME: Marasmus
DES: Extreme malnutrition from inadequate caloric intake leads to severe weight loss and muscle wasting.
COMP: I've lost so much weight, and I can’t find the energy to do anything.

NAME: Weak Immune System
DES: Malnutrition weakens the immune system, increasing susceptibility to infections and diseases.
COMP: Even small wounds take forever to heal, and I feel so drained of energy.

NAME: Arthritis
DES: Poor nutrition can exacerbate joint inflammation and pain associated with arthritis.
COMP: My joints are swollen, and they feel so stiff and painful.

NAME: Bronchitis
DES: A weakened immune system due to malnutrition makes the body more prone to respiratory infections like bronchitis.
COMP: I can't stop coughing, it's hard to breathe.

NAME: Sinus Infection
DES: Inadequate nutrition weakens the immune system, increasing the risk of sinus infections.
COMP: My sinuses are completely blocked, and it’s making my face hurt.

NAME: Constipation
DES: A diet lacking in fiber and essential nutrients can lead to digestive issues like constipation.
COMP: My stomach is killing me and I feel so bloated.

NAME: Dehydration
DES: Malnutrition often includes inadequate fluid intake, leading to dehydration and its associated health issues.
COMP: I'm so thirsty, I think it’s making my muscles cramp up.

NAME: Depression
DES: Nutrient deficiencies can impact brain health and contribute to mental health disorders such as depression.
COMP: I feel so drained of happiness and energy, but I can’t get any sleep.

NAME: Flu
DES: Malnutrition compromises the immune system, making individuals more susceptible to severe influenza infections.
COMP: I've got a fever and chills, and my muscles ache.

NAME: Gout
DES: A concentration of uric acid in the joints, particularly in the big toes of the feet, causing pain and swelling.
COMP: My foot hurts so much, and it's really swollen.

NAME: Hay Fever
DES: An allergic reaction to airborne substances like pollen.
COMP: I can't stop sneezing, and my sinuses are congested.

NAME: Hives
DES: A skin condition characterized by red, itchy welts caused by an allergic reaction.
COMP: I've got this itchy rash all over.

NAME: Osteoporosis
DES: A condition where bones become weak and brittle from loss of tissue, due to insufficient calcium and vitamin D intake from a poor diet.
COMP: My back hurts a lot, and I bruise so easily.

NAME: Pneumonia
DES: An infection that inflames the air sacs in one or both lungs.
COMP: It's so hard to breathe, and my lungs feel wheezy.

NAME: Psoriasis
DES: A skin disease marked by red, itchy, scaly patches.
COMP: My skin is really dry and itchy, it’s sometimes unbearable.

NAME: Sciatica
DES: Pain radiating along the sciatic nerve, which runs down one or both legs from the lower back.
COMP: My back hurts, and my legs feel a bit numb and tingly.

NAME: Tinnitus
DES: The perception of noise or ringing in the ears caused by inner ear issues.
COMP: There's this constant ringing in my ears, I can't concentrate.

NAME: Tonsillitis
DES: Inflammation of the tonsils, causing sore throat, difficulty swallowing, and fever.
COMP: My throat is killing me, and I think I have a fever.

NAME: Urinary Tract Infection
DES: An infection in any part of the urinary system.
COMP: I've got this pain in my pelvis, and I think I have a slight fever.

NAME: Vertigo
DES: Nausea and a sensation of spinning or dizziness often caused by problems in the inner ear.
COMP: My ears are ringing, and I feel extremely nauseous.

NAME: Acne
DES: A condition where the skin reacts to poor hygiene, hormonal changes, or a diet lacking in proper nutrients, leading to pimples and cysts.
COMP: I've got these painful cysts and a rash that won't go away.

NAME: Alopecia
DES: Hair loss from the scalp or other parts of the body.
COMP: I'm losing a lot of hair, and my scalp itches.

NAME: Asthma
DES: A respiratory condition marked by spasms in the bronchi, causing difficulty breathing
COMP: I get really wheezy, and my chest hurts sometimes.

NAME: Carpal Tunnel Syndrome
DES: A condition caused by compression of the median nerve in the wrist, leading to pain and numbness.
COMP: My wrist hurts and my fingers are going numb.

NAME: Celiac Disease
DES: An immune reaction to eating gluten, leading to damage in the small intestine.
COMP: I get a lot of gas when I eat, and I've been losing weight without trying.

NAME: Food Poisoning
DES: Illness caused by consuming contaminated food, leading to nausea, vomiting, and diarrhea.
COMP: I feel so nauseous, and I can't stop vomiting.

NAME: High Blood Pressure
DES: A condition in which the force of the blood against the artery walls is too high
COMP: Every so often my chest starts to hurt and it becomes hard to breathe.

NAME: Hyperglycemia
DES: High blood sugar levels, often associated with diabetes or an improper diet.
COMP: I'm always thirsty, and I feel nauseous.

NAME: Hyperthyroidism
DES: An overactive thyroid gland producing excessive thyroid hormones.
COMP: I've been losing weight quickly, and my hair is so brittle, it just starts falling out when I touch it.

NAME: Hypoglycemia
DES: Extremely low blood sugar levels.
COMP: I feel nauseous, and my heart is beating in a weird way.

NAME: Hypothyroidism
DES: An underactive thyroid gland producing insufficient thyroid hormones.
COMP: I've gained so much weight, and I feel tired all the time.

NAME: Irritable Bowel Syndrome
DES: A gastrointestinal disorder causing abdominal pain, bloating, and altered bowel habits.
COMP: I get a lot of abdominal pain and feel bloated after I eat.

NAME: Lupus
DES: An autoimmune disease causing inflammation and damage to various body tissues.
COMP: I have no energy at all, and I have this terrible rash.

NAME: Rheumatoid Arthritis
DES: An autoimmune disorder causing chronic inflammation of the joints.
COMP: My joints are always so stiff and painful.

NAME: Shingles
DES: A viral infection causing a painful rash, typically on one side of the body.
COMP: I've got these painful cysts and bumps, they’re so itchy.

NAME: Wound Infection
DES: An infection in an open wound, causing redness, swelling, and pus.
COMP: I’ve had a fever and the chills ever since this wound started swelling up.

NAME: Broken Bones
DES: Fractures in the bones due to injury or trauma.
COMP: The pain in my wrist is intense, and it’s covered in bruises.

NAME: Bell's Palsy
DES: Sudden weakness or paralysis of the muscles on one side of the face.
COMP: One side of my face doesn’t move when I smile, and I’ve been struggling with a bad headache.

NAME: Crohn's Disease
DES: A chronic inflammatory bowel disease affecting the lining of the digestive tract.
COMP: I get terrible abdominal pain after eating, and I feel absolutely drained of energy.

NAME: Endometriosis
DES: A condition where tissue similar to the lining of the uterus grows outside the uterus, causing pain and infertility.
COMP: I have so much pain in my pelvis it makes me nauseous.

NAME: Epilepsy
DES: A neurological disorder characterized by recurrent seizures.
COMP: I have seizures, and I get confused afterward.

NAME: Hepatitis
DES: Inflammation of the liver, often caused by viral infection.
COMP: My abdomen hurts, and my skin and eyes are starting to look a little yellow.

NAME: Lyme Disease
DES: An infectious disease transmitted by ticks, causing fever, headache, and a characteristic skin rash.
COMP: I get fevers and chills, and my heart beats uncontrollably.

NAME: Multiple Sclerosis
DES: An autoimmune disease affecting the central nervous system, leading to physical and cognitive impairments.
COMP: I have intense muscle spasms and sometimes my vision blurs.

NAME: Hypomagnesemia
DES: Low levels of magnesium in the blood, causing muscle cramps and weakness.
COMP: My muscles are weak and have been having spasms every now and then

NAME: Parkinson's Disease
DES: A neurodegenerative disorder affecting movement and causing tremors and stiffness.
COMP: My hands and arms shake uncontrollably, while my muscles are uncomfortably stiff.

NAME: Poisoning
DES: Illness caused by ingesting, inhaling, or coming into contact with toxic substances.
COMP: I have serious stomach pain, and I can’t stop vomiting.

NAME: Stunted Growth
DES: Impaired growth and development in children due to malnutrition or chronic illness.
COMP: I don’t think I'm growing like I should- in fact I've lost weight.

NAME: Tuberculosis
DES: A bacterial infection that primarily affects the lungs, causing cough, fever, and weight loss.
COMP: I have a persistent cough and pain in my chest.

NAME: Hypoproteinemia
DES: Low levels of protein in the blood, often due to malnutrition or liver disease.
COMP: My whole body feels swollen, and my hair is so brittle and weak it just falls right out.
